data.actual_result: Sometimes the radio button gets stuck or the screen goes blank until you scroll the screen to load entries
data.expected_result: Option selects and filter applies immediately
data.short_description: [Audit Logs] Selecting an action filter is not very responsive
data.steps_to_repro: - Get 7.5.5 update - Go to Server Settings > Audit Logs - Tap Filter by Actions - Select an option
